meanings.definition: The state or quality of being in rut.
meanings.sent1: The ruttiness of the deer was evident during mating season.
meanings.sent2: The farmer noticed the ruttiness of the male goats as they competed for the attention of the females.
meanings.sent3: The ruttiness of the squirrel trying to impress its mate by gathering extra nuts was quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: The ruttiness of the lion in pursuit of its prey was like a fierce storm approaching.
meanings.sent5: The ruttiness of the dog in heat filled the air with a primal energy.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of being in a state of sexual excitement or aggression.
meanings.sent1: The ruttiness of the cat in the alley attracted other felines with its scent.
meanings.sent2: The zookeeper recognized the ruttiness of the male elephant by its restless behavior.
meanings.sent3: The ruttiness of the rooster crowing loudly to impress the hens was quite comical.
meanings.sent4: The ruttiness of the bull in the bullfight arena was like a raging fire.
meanings.sent5: The ruttiness of the wild horses running freely in the field was a sight to behold.
